creator: pvainio@sci.fi
text:
Ajp13Connector does not take care of jvmroutes and does not append jvmroute
to session cookie value or url session id.

creator: remm@apache.org
text: As per Henri's comments, this will be addressed in the future.

creator: remm@apache.org
text: This has been addressed in Tomcat 4.0.2 b2 or later.
